newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo stocks little changed in early morning trade.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo stocks little changed in early morning trade.

text.p: Tokyo stocks were little changed in early morning trade on Friday, although major blue-chip issues were pressured by profit taking due to the yen's firming against the dollar overnight, brokers said.
But property-related shares continued to gain ground after the previous day's rally, which limited losses in the key market index, they said.
The Nikkei 225 average was up 17.96 points or 0.09 percent at 19,069.67 in the first 15 minutes of trade. The March futures were unchanged at 19,070.
